entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
